subject: Re: Debian GNU/Linux (kfreebsd anyone?) Lenny Desktop wishlist	thread
body:
Luis Matos wrote:
> i know you have commented, but ... is g-i/d-i adaptable to be executed
> from X?
> 
> it would be good if you boot into the live system (gnome for example)
> and execute g-i fom the desktop to install it.

as i said, it needs a special build, but it's possible without changes
at the sources. that is what mario was told by the g-i people.

--
